meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a boy.
meanings.sent1: He ran boyishly across the field, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: She smiled boyishly at her friends, showing her playful side.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail boyishly, eager to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: The wind tousled his hair boyishly as he rode his bike down the hill.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed boyishly as they played tag in the park.

meanings.definition: In a youthful or playful manner.
meanings.sent1: The young girl skipped boyishly down the street, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: He winked boyishly at his crush, trying to be charming.
meanings.sent3: The kitten pounced boyishly on a toy mouse, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed boyishly through the room, contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The old man danced boyishly at the party, reminiscing about his youth.
